descendant.translation[0].definitions[0]: someone who is related to a person who lived a long time ago, or to a family, group of people etc that existed in the past
The coastal areas were occupied by the descendants of Greek colonists.
He was a direct descendant of Napoleon Bonaparte.
descendant.translation[0].definitions[1]: something that has developed from something else
Quechua is a descendant of the Inca language.
